User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)

Steps to reproduce:

I opened FireFox and other programs.


Actual results:

Firefox menu was too transparent - it displayed parts of other windows, running is background.

comments.text:
Transparency in menues is complete nonsense since it kills accessibility.

IE or Chrome show how transparency effects can be used without affecting usability too much.
